name: Catholic Charities of South Carolina - Midlands Office
description: This office offers a range of services, including "Clean of Heart," which provides showers and laundry services to the homeless population. They also have a clothing closet and other wellness services
services: Catholic-owned Interior cleaning in South-Carolina consultation

name: Catholic Charities of South Carolina - Upstate Office
description: The Upstate office provides services such as a food pantry, clothing closet, and mobile showers. They serve individuals and families in need within the 12 counties of Upstate South Carolina
services: Catholic-owned Interior cleaning in South-Carolina consultation

name: Clean of Heart Laundry and Shower Services (Columbia)
description: This is a ministry of Catholic Charities offering showers and laundry services to the homeless population in Columbia. Appointments are often required
services: Catholic-owned Interior cleaning in South-Carolina consultation

name: Clean of Heart Mobile Ministry (Greenville)
description: While a specific address for the mobile unit isn't listed, this service operates under Catholic Charities of South Carolina to provide laundry and shower services to the homeless population in the Greenville area. Contact the Upstate office for more information
services: Catholic-owned Interior cleaning in South-Carolina consultation
